title: PuraVegan
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Raw, Juice bar, Take-out, Catering
description: Saint Louis vegan cafe, opened May 2011 and under current ownership since Mar 2012. Its kitchen is 100% gluten-free and uses low/no salt and oil. Offers mostly raw and some cooked food, dessert, juices, smoothies, and grab-n-go items. Free parking lot available. Also offers yoga and healthy cooking classes, cleanses, and health coaching - see website for schedule.
